name: Stained Glass Sky
description:
A cute but heart-wrenching science-fiction visual novel about two researchers on a far off planet, who finally see the UFO they've been looking for in the night sky above.

Done in around 4 days for Weekly Game Jam 238, with a theme of UFO. My first proper published game! :]

Code, Writing and Art by @minkonn (me)
Music - Nostalgic Dreams And Echoes by @braveo

Poetic monologues and non-explicit gay people!!! Let's go!!!!!!
